title: Embroidered Picture, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: wool, silk
Technique: embroidered in stem and knot stitches on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Frederick D. Hill
description: Kneeling figure of a woman clutching a child with a cardinal and a bishop at the right and a weeping woman at the left. The scene is the interior of a church, with a tomb of a knight in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: wool, silk
Technique: embroidered in stem and knot stitches on plain weave. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Frederick D. Hill. 1977-50-1.
